message.content: {"id": "11863", "title": "Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove", "description": "When performing an Update Test Suite action, it is not clear that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will result in 'X' being removed from the test suite.", "OB": "The user encounters confusion regarding the removal of test cases when selecting 'Y' in the dialog during the Update Test Suite action.", "EB": "", "SR": "The Update Test Suite action should clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will remove test cases, rather than performing an update based on the selection in the dialog."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '11863', 'title': 'Bug 11863Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove', 'description': '', 'OB': "Bug 11863Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove It is no clear that if I onlyselect Y in the dialog that I'll end up with X being removed. ", 'EB': '', 'SR': 'What the action actually does is RECREATE the test suite based on the selectionin the dialog.I do an update on a test suite which contains X. '}
